article_title: OSU Sports: Deric Robertson's family drives from Killeen, Texas to visit him at fan day

og.description: This was the second year in a row that Robertson’s parents, Patricia and Alexander, and his 13-year-old sister Lauren made the 400-plus mile trek north for fan day.
